item.title: CVE-2021-28201|2024-09-17T01:31:19.486Z -- asus -- bmc%20firmware%20for%20asmb9-ikvm
item.description: The Service configuration-1 function in ASUS BMCâ€™s firmware Web management page does not verify the string length entered by users, resulting in a Buffer overflow vulnerability. As obtaining the privileged permission, remote attackers use the leakage to abnormally terminate the Web service.
